review: I just got around to installing this after the holidays and other family commitments that took up most of January.  I have had nothing but issues.  My wireless router is fine, my bandwidth is fine.  We have no issues with any other devices that we have connected to our tv.  The video playback halts quite often and displays low bandwidth errors or disconnects from the wireless altogether.  I cannot even make it through 1 episode of a standard definition tv show.  Since I installed it mere days after the return window expired, Amazon would not allow me to return the device for a full refund or even store credit.  My only recourse was to allow them to troubleshoot the issues.  It seems to be working ever so slightly better, but I am still inundated with low bandwidth errors.  It is interesting that I can typically use several devices to access streaming content on a regular basis with no issues, but when this ONE device is the only one utilizing bandwidth, it cannot seem to find adequate bandwidth with which to function adequately.  It is my fault for not attempting to install this within the return window, but I am very disappointed that Amazon was unwilling to budge on their policy for the sake of a loyal customer and for good customer service.  This device will be finding its way into the nearest trash bin as soon as I am finished writing this review.  And I will not consider purchasing any other items manufactured by amazon and will stick with Apple.
